sect1.title: The Python Console
sect1.para: In order to do tests about plugins, or whatever concept that we can try, we need a way to enter Python statements on a live &app; environment. This is why &gwp; has a Python, you can access it by selecting Python console on the View menu, or pressing Ctrl Y .

As you see on , you have available the gwp module, where you have listed all the classes and functions to write your plugins. As the plugin support is a work-in-progress feature, the plugin API will surely change, nevertheless it's in a semi-stable state.
It's necessary to say that the python console is not an original work from &gwp;'s development team, it was copied from the Dia Project and adapted to our environment.
